evidence.quote: Dose modifications for common adverse events are typically outlined in the medication's Summary of Product Characteristics (SmPC). Each drug will have specific guidelines based on the type and severity of the adverse event. For precise details, please refer to the SmPC or EPAR.

notes: The response correctly directs to the SmPC for on-label dose modifications, maintaining compliance. It is clear and concise, providing useful guidance without promoting off-label use.
